body_html: Here @asimshankar, basically I replaced all uses of std::vector and std::deque by std::list, which seems more permissive. I could reproduce before the problem on a Mac with C++ 4.2 and it now seems happy with it. Can we remerge the code please?
body_text: Here @asimshankar, basically I replaced all uses of std::vector and std::deque by std::list, which seems more permissive. I could reproduce before the problem on a Mac with C++ 4.2 and it now seems happy with it. Can we remerge the code please?
body: Here @asimshankar, basically I replaced all uses of `std::vector` and `std::deque` by `std::list`, which seems more permissive. I could reproduce before the problem on a Mac with C++ 4.2 and it now seems happy with it. Can we remerge the code please?
